name: anthropic-ai
description: Training bot for Anthropic's AI model, Claude.

name: Bytespider
description: Training bot for ByteDance's (the Chinese owner of TikTok) AI services, including ChatGPT competitor Doubao.

name: ChatGPT-User
description: Used for enable ChatGPT to answer a query from a user by crawling and summarizing website content.

name: CCBot
description: Crawl bot for the Common Crawl dataset, used to train many AI services included ChatGPT 3.

name: Diffbot
description: Scrapes and sells AI training data to third parties.

name: FacebookBot
description: Meta's training bot currently used for AI speech recognition technology.

name: Google-Extended
description: Training bot for Google's AI services, such as Bard.

name: omgili
description: Scrapes and sells AI training data to third parties.
